Alias.script: local offset = matches[2] if not offset then offset = 0 end acal.whipHampsters(offset)

Script.name: acal_config
acal_main
Script.script:
--displays the calendar with a given year offset function acal.displayCalendar(year_offset)
local s --major sections local x --columns local y --minor sections local z --rows
local mname --month name local mfg --month foreground local mbg --month background local sep = ' | '
local year = acal.time.year + year_offset local month --month getLineNumber local day --day number
for s=1,3,1 do --Sections if s==1 then echo(' +--------------------- ACHAEAN CALENDAR '..year..' AF ---------------------+ ') end echo('\n') echo(sep) for h=1,4 do --Headers month = ((s-1)*4)+h mname = acal.config.months[month][1] mbg = acal.config.bgcolors[month] mfg = acal.getFg(mbg[1],mbg[2],mbg[3])
local s1 = math.floor((14-#mname)/2) local s2 = 14-#mname-s1 local txt = mname local cmd = [[send(']]..acal.config.months[month][2]..[[',false)]] local hnt = acal.config.months[month][3]
setFgColor(mfg[1],mfg[2],mfg[3]) setBgColor(mbg[1],mbg[2],mbg[3]) echo(string.rep(' ',s1)) echoLink(txt,cmd,hnt,true) echo(string.rep(' ',s2)) resetFormat() echo(sep)
end --for Headers
for x=1,5,1 do --Details X Rows echo('\n') for y=1,4,1 do --Details Y Sections echo(sep) month = ((s-1)*4)+y mname = acal.config.months[month][1] for z=1,5,1 do --Details Z Columns day = ((x-1)*5)+z
--check for sernade local sstring = '' if acal.checkSerenade(year, month, day) then local bg = acal.config.colors['serenade'][1] local fg = acal.config.colors['serenade'][2] setBgColor(bg[1],bg[2],bg[3]) setFgColor(fg[1],fg[2],fg[3]) sstring = '\nOrphean Serenade' end --if
--check for upcoming local ustring = acal.returnUpcoming(year, month, day) if ustring ~= '' then local bg = acal.config.colors['upcoming'][1] local fg = acal.config.colors['upcoming'][2] setBgColor(bg[1],bg[2],bg[3]) setFgColor(fg[1],fg[2],fg[3]) end --if
--check for reminders local rstring = acal.returnReminders(year, mname, day) if rstring ~= '' then setFgColor(0,0,0) setBgColor(255,255,0) end --if
--color for both reminder and event if rstring ~= '' and ustring ~= '' then setFgColor(0,0,0) setBgColor(255,140,0) end --if
--check for current day if acal.checkCurrentDay(year, month, day) then setFgColor(0,0,0) setBgColor(57,255,20) end --if
local txt = string.format('%2s',day) local cmd = [[send('date ]]..tostring(day)..[[ ]]..tostring(mname)..[[ ]]..tostring(year)..[[',false)]] local hnt = acal.returnLocalTime(year,month,day)..sstring..ustring..rstring echoLink(txt,cmd,hnt,true) resetFormat() if z~=5 then echo(' ') end end --z end --y echo(sep) end --for x end --sections echo('\n +-------------------------------------------------------------------+ ') send(' ') end--function
function acal.whipHampsters(year_offset)
if gmcp.Char.Name.name == 'Jinsun' then acal.msg('BAHAHAHA! Pirates don\'t get fancy calendars!') else enableTrigger('acal_upcoming_open') enableTrigger('acal_reminder_open') sendGMCP("IRE.Time.Request") send('upcoming',false) send('reminder list',false) tempTimer(.5,[[acal.displayCalendar(]]..year_offset..[[)]]) end end
function acal.checkSerenade(y, m, d) local d1 = (acal.time.year - 1) * 300 + (acal.time.mon - 1) * 25 + acal.time.day local d2 = (y - 1) * 300 + (m - 1) * 25 + d local d = d2 - d1 local t = os.date("!*t",os.time()+(d*60*60)) return t.hour == 0 end --function
function acal.checkCurrentDay(y,m,d) local cd = tonumber(acal.time.day) local cm = tonumber(acal.time.mon) local cy = tonumber(acal.time.year)
if y == cy and m == cm and d == cd then return true else return false end
end --function
--function to determine proper foreground colour function acal.getFg(r,g,b) if (r*0.299 + g*0.587 + b*0.114) > 150 then return {0,0,0} else return {255,255,255} end end
--append events function acal.addUpcomingEvent(id,event,days,hours,minutes) if days == '' then days = 0 else days = tonumber(days) end if hours == '' then hours = 0 else hours = tonumber(hours) end if minutes == '' then minutes = 0 else minutes = tonumber(minutes) end local t = (days * 24) + hours if minutes > 30 then t = t + 1 end acal.upcoming[id] = {event:trim(),t} end
--return events for specific day function acal.returnUpcoming(y, m, d) local d1 = (acal.time.year - 1) * 300 + (acal.time.mon - 1) * 25 + acal.time.day local d2 = (y - 1) * 300 + (m - 1) * 25 + d local d = d2 - d1 local s = '' for _, e in pairs(acal.upcoming) do if e[2] == d then s = s..'\n(U) '..e[1] end end --for return s end
--adds a reminder to the list function acal.addReminder(id,reminder,year,month,day) day = tonumber(day) year = tonumber(year) acal.reminders[id] = {reminder:trim(),year,month,day} end --function
--return reminders for day function acal.returnReminders(y,m,d) local s = '' for _, r in pairs(acal.reminders) do if r[2] == y and r[3] == m and r[4] == d then s = s..'\n(R) '..r[1] end end --for return s end --function
--return local time function acal.returnLocalTime(y,m,d) local d1 = (acal.time.year - 1) * 300 + (acal.time.mon - 1) * 25 + acal.time.day local d2 = (y - 1) * 300 + (m - 1) * 25 + d local d = d2 - d1 local t = os.date("%B %d (%I%p)",os.time()+(d*60*60)) return t end --function

Script.name: acal_time_capture
Script.script:
--sets time as it recieves it via gmcp function acal.setTime() acal.time = gmcp.IRE.Time.List end
--updates time as it recieves it via gmcp function acal.updateTime() if acal.time then for k,v in pairs(gmcp.IRE.Time.Update) do acal.time[k] = v end end end
--adds support for gmcp time function acal.registerTime() if not acal.time then sendGMCP('Core.Supports.Add ["IRE.Time 1"]') end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent","acal.registerTime") registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.Time", "acal.setTime") registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.Time.Update", "acal.updateTime") acal.registerTime()

Script.name: acal_downloads
Script.script:
function acal.downloadedFile(_,filename) acal.updating = true if filename:find("version") then acal.checkVersion(filename) end if filename:find("achaea%-calendar") then acal.installPackage(filename) end acal.updating = false end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "acal.downloadedFile")
function acal.getFilePath() local t,s = lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir().."/achaea_calendar/") if not t and s ~= "File exists" then acal.msg("Couldn't make the '"..downloadfolder.."' folder; "..s) return end return getMudletHomeDir().."/achaea_calendar/" end --function
function acal.downloadVersion() if acal.updating then return end local path = acal.getFilePath()..'version.txt' local url = 'https://thaisenachaeascripts.github.io/Achaea-Calendar/version.txt' downloadFile(path, url) end
function acal.checkVersion(filename) local f, s = io.open(filename) if f then s = f:read("*l"):trim(); io.close(f) end if s ~= acal.config.version then acal.msg('') cechoLink("The script was updated! Click here to get it now!", [[acal.downloadScript()]], "Install Script!", true) end end
function acal.downloadScript() if acal.updating then return end local path = acal.getFilePath()..'achaea-calendar.xml' local url = 'https://thaisenachaeascripts.github.io/Achaea-Calendar/achaea-calendar.xml' downloadFile(path, url) acal.msg('Downloading new script!') end
function acal.installPackage(filename) if not filename:find("achaea-calendar",1,true) then return end uninstallPackage('achaea-calendar') installPackage(filename) os.remove(filename) acal.msg('Script installed!') end

Script.name: acal_intialize
Script.script:
--runs once, when script is installed function acal.installed(_, p) local v = '1.0'
if p == 'achaea-calendar' then local filename = acal.getFilePath() .. 'config.lua' if io.exists(filename) then acal.loadConfig() else acal.saveConfig() end acal.config.version = v
acal.msg('Calendar installation complete. ACAL to check it out!') end end --function
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysInstallPackage","acal.installed")
